title: Schedule a Delivery Appointment
description: A shipment is approaching its destination, and the carrier needs to schedule a delivery appointment with the receiving facility.

tasks.description: Receive an automated alert that a shipment is within 24 hours of its destination.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is prompted to schedule the delivery.

tasks.description: Access the receiving facility's scheduling portal to view available delivery slots.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent can see a calendar of open appointment times.

tasks.description: Book an available appointment slot and send the confirmation to the carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the appointment and notifies the carrier.
